text: læa phu thi sux khea ma cak xiyipt klaw kab phriya khxng khea wa cng hı thiphak kæ khea xyang mi keiyrti bangthi khea ca tha prayochn hı rea di bang hrux rab khea pen butr læa chen nan hæla rea di tha hı yu suf mi xanac nı phændin læa pheux rea ca di sxn hı khea ru wicha thanay fan læa xallxhˌ thrng pen phu phichit nı kickar khxng phraxngkh læa tæwa swn hıy khxng mnusʹy miru
